title: @Riot, Didn't you say you'll introduce a Shield reducing [mechanic/item] this season?
body:
When will we get information regarding this matter? Shields are the most problematic thing in this meta [besides the Assassin dmg].

Here's a list of things that you should consider when introducing the shield reduction item/s:-

-Make it so both build paths [AD/AP] benefit from it
-Rework {{item:3135}}  so it can be equal of [[{{item:3033}} {{item:3036}} ]]
-Allow Mages to build something out of [ {{item:3140}}  ]

I don't play Mages, but I believe they deserve to have more options since even AD casters/hypercarries/ADCs can benefit from {{item:2419}}  [Zhonyas active].

replies.body:
ATTENTION:
{{item:3135}} DOES NOT NEED TO BE REWORKED. It grants you 80 AP and +40% **magic penetration**. Please note, **magic penetration is NOT the same as bonus magic penetration**. Pure magic penetration nullifies **ALL MR**, not just the bonus MR, which is MR that is added to the base stats that comes from items or abilities or friendly effects. This means that Void Staff will allow you cut base MR levels which Whisper and Regards do not.

Both {{item:3036}} and {{item:3035}} grant +35% **bonus armor penetration**. This means those items will never be able to cut below base armor stats. Bonus armor is the exact same as bonus MR, it is the armor that originates from items and spells and friendly effects. 

If AD had a version of Void Staff, it would be the armor penetration nightmare of Season 6 all over again.

Edited*
Wait what? It will never give the enemies negative mr. It ignores 40% of mr. Even if the target had 1 mr, the mr wouldnt even become 0.
yes but if someone has {{item:3151}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}}  they can lower someones mr below 0 so it does allow you to cut below 0 mr if you stack mr pen
With the other 3 yeah you are able to cut below 0 but you need all three.

Actually, magic penetration, bonus or otherwise, just _stops_ at 0 so, no, you can't reduce an enemy's magic resistance below 0 with _magic penetration_; it has to actually be reduced below 0 with _magic resistance reduction_, both forms of it (percentage and flat) are applied _before_ penetration is.

**"Note: Magic Penetration cannot affect enemy magic resistance beyond 0 to deal bonus damage."**
- http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Magic_penetration

There's only eight sources of MR reduction in the game at the moment though, (seven available to champions: one item, six abilities;  five percentage reductions, two flat reductions; and then Baron's debuff), so that's not going to happen in a hurry.
But if they do _reduce_ it below zero, then yes, they take more magic damage. The blue buff has negative MR as standard, as an example.

Also while Void Staff regularly reduces less _numerically_, that's because MR is a little harder to stack to good effect than armour (due to the ADC _existing_, you pretty much always need some form of armour if you're building tanky).
It's still an increase in damage to _everyone_. Moreso, because like others have said, it also affects _base_ MR.
You can use Wit's End to get below 0 though.

Wit's End is a (the only) flat _MR reduction_ item. It's separate from Magic Penetration in that it _directly_ modifies the target's MR for its duration, for _everyone_'s damage, not just your for the purposes of your own damage.

Magic penetration is a separate stat, and is flat-out ignored if the target's MR is below 0 at any stage.
I edited it - but still, Void Staff is better in comparison to Whisper and Regards because it isn't limited to just bonus MR.
